amendment.description: Relating to energy efficiency in the weapons platforms of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4283 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4283 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S5933-5937; text: CR S5934) Relating to energy efficiency in the weapons platforms of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4283 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
